subject: Football
Accidents and Safety
Football (College)
Video Recordings and Downloads
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame said it would no longer use hydraulic lifts for videographers at football practices, five months after a student fell to his death when one of the lifts toppled over.
snippet: Notre Dame said it would no longer use hydraulic lifts for videographers at football practices, five months after a student fell to his death when one of the lifts toppled over.
